name: vqSmarthome
0:
”alexa, arm my vesta.”
”alexa, arm my vesta in away mode.”
”alexa, disarm vesta.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Vesta smart home skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Vesta by voice to control Vesta shield. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Vesta account and discover your devices. to experience the ultimate convenience of voice controlled Vesta you must have a Vesta account with hub registered to that account. 

Control Vesta shield:

To control Vesta shield, simply tell Alexa to arm/disarm :
-“Alexa, arm my vesta”
-“Alexa, arm my vesta in away mode”
-“Alexa, disarm my vesta”

Find more information about Vesta smart home at https://viewqwest.com/smartliving/vesta
